name: Saloon Shootout (Ulvi and Martin)
description:
This is a game about a revovler. a revovler that wants you to help it stay in the air (and in the screen) with the recoil. u collect ammo boxes to make sure you can shoot. you shoot targets to get score and to progress through the game where you will meet new and interesting targets and powerups. there is a quest board where you can complete 20 unique quests, if you want to, or you can just play the game in between your qeues in other games too improve your reaction time.

we did get inspiration from a phone game, which we dont know the name of but saw and ad of it one time.

we do get some complaints from our friends that the game is too hard, but we think thats part of it and if you spend more then 1 hour you will more then likely be able to get all the achivements, so good luck and stay strong! and for goodness sake dont was ammo in the early game

this game was made in gamemaker studio 2 and by, on discord, felxdenik and Martyy, we would apreciate any comment good or bad :)

(music still in work)
